price: 99. Hadday kuwakani ahaan lahaayeen ilaahyo ma ay galeen (Naarta), dhammaanna way ku waadhi.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
